alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Windham, Tolland, northeastern Hartford, southwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire and southeastern Hampden Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over East Longmeadow, or near Enfield, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Heavy rain may cause ponding of water or minor flooding in urbanized areas and areas that drain water poorly. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Springfield, Manchester, Chicopee, Enfield, Glastonbury, Vernon, Mansfield, South Windsor, Ludlow, Killingly, Holden, Webster, Southbridge, Auburn, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Belchertown and Wilbraham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
